rules_text:
When UX02 Consul Q enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Construct artifact creature token.
At the beginning of your end step, if you control three or more equipped, or artifact creatures, transform UX02 Consul Q.
rules_text2:
Ward–{2} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)[/i]
{1}, Sacrifice an artifact: Moebius Q gets +2/+0, and can't be blocked until end of turn.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you are stagnant, transform Moebius Q. [i](You are stagnant if you didn't attack a player during your last turn.)[/i]
